text: Ilex khasiana is a species of plant in the family Aquifoliaceae. It is endemic to India. Four very rare specimens grow on Shillong Peak, 10 km west of Shillong, Meghalaya, northeast India. ==References== khasiana Category:Flora of Meghalaya Category:Critically endangered flora of Asia Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Ilex khasiana
